oai_dc:dc.dc:title: STATISTICAL PROPERTIES OF THE MAXIMUM RUN OF IRREGULAR SEA WAVES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kimura, Akira
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: irregular waves
run up
statistical properties
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The probability distribution of the maximum run of irregular wave height is introduced theoretically. Probability distributions for the 2nd maximum, 3rd maximum and further maximum runs are also introduced. Their statistical properties, including the means and their confidence regions, are applied to the verification of experiments with irregular waves in the realization of a "severe sea state" in the test.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 21 (1988): Proceedings of 21st Conference on Coastal Engineering, Torremolinos, Spain, 1988.; 48
